text: Good morning My love, sorry for yesterday but I am so tired, I try to stay awake but i so tired, u know if i being here its because i love u and because i think a lot of u. i hope ur night is good and u sleep weel, i wish u have a amazing day baby with love, respect and happyness. i wanna spend my day with u too, i wait to u awakeğŸ˜˜ see you soon baby ğŸ˜˜
